Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 010483 ZMK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 45.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, The Junction Zoning Map Changes, Brooklyn (010483ZMK)

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure, application no. C 010026 MMK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, changes to the City Map, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 45.  This application is subject to Council review and action only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by a vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter and §11.20 of the Rules of the Council.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, The Junction City Map Change, Brooklyn (C010026MMK)

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 010486 ZSK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 45 to allow portions of railroad right of way which is completely covered by a platform to be included in the lot area of a development.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, The Junction Special Permit, Brooklyn (010486ZSK)

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 010484 ZSK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 45 to allow an unattended parking garage with a maximum capacity of 552 spaces.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, The Junction Special Permit, Brooklyn (010484ZSK)
